Feature.Name: Light Step
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you alter your density and weight to improve your mobility. For the rest of your turn, your walking speed increases by 10 feet, and the next time you stand up, you need to spend no more than 10 feet of movement to do so.

FeatureContainer.Source: Unearthed Arcana 6 - Psionics and the Mystic, Take 2
